column3: Investigation Stage - Cases Pending Investigation from Previous Year (Col. 3)
column4: Investigation Stage - Cases Reported during the Year (Col. 4)
column5: Investigation Stage - Cases Withdrawn by Govt. during Investigation (Col. 5)
column6: Investigation Stage - Cases not Investigated or Investigation was Refused (Col. 6)
column7: Investigation Stage - Cases Declared Fals on Account of Mistake of Fact or Law (Col. 7)
column8: Investigation Stage - Cases in Which Charge Sheets Were Submitted (Col. 8)
column9: Investigation Stage - Cases in Which Final Report Submitted (Col. 9)
column10: Investigation Stage - Total True Cases (Col. 10) = Col. (8 + 9)
column11: Investigation Stage - Cases Pending Investigation at the end of the Year (Col. 11)
column12: Trial Stage - Cases Pending Trial from Previous Year (Col. 12)
column13: Trial Stage - Cases Sent for Trial During the Year (Col. 13)
column14: Trial Stage - Cases Withdrawn by Govt. During Trial (Col. 14)
column15: Trial Stage - Total Cases for Trial During the Year (Col. 15)
column16: Trial Stage - Cases Compounded or Withdrawn (Col. 16)
column17: Trial Stage - Cases in Which Trials Were Completed (Col. 17)
column19: Trial Stage - Cases Acquitted or Discharged (Col. 19)
column20: Trial Stage - Cases Pending Trial at the end of the Year (Col. 20)
